prompt: I am making the move to New Jersey for a job promotion I recently received. I've pretty much lived in the Midwest most of my life and have limited knowledge and connections in NJ. Affordability would be a mega plus but the rental market seems to disagree with me a little bit on that one. I'm also working remotely so commuting is not a concern - although I will have a car to travel for client meetings. rec_reasons4: Historic downtown with modern amenities;Active nightlife and dining options;Walkable and safe;Young professional community;Frequent community events and festivals
rec_reasons5: Trendy and artsy vibe;Close to the beach;Growing food and music scene;Walkable and bike-friendly;Young and diverse population

rec_reasons5: Home to the University of Alabama;Good public schools;Access to healthcare facilities;Rural areas with acreage available
